typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ten_cd as string,
		item_cd as string,
		tei_su as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> csvdata
csvdata derive(create_user = upper('BWEL2250'),
		create_date = currentTimestamp()) ~> csvdata2
csvdata2 window(over(line_no = rowNumber())) ~> csvdata3
